Title: Requires utility corporations and municipalities include in an email regarding a bill for service the amount owed on such bill for service
Summary: Requires utility corporations and municipalities include in an email regarding a bill for service the amount owed on such bill for service where the amount owed is prominently displayed and accurate.
LawCode: Amd ยง44, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring utility corporations and municipalities include in an email regarding a bill for service the amount owed on such bill for service
